item.source: I need help with Rune c bow animation!

item.title: I need help with Rune c bow animation!
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Ok first off search this:

public void checkbow()

then add this below it:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == (13800) // rune crossbow

Next search for this:

/* Other Bows */

Below it add this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 13800) { // Rune crossbow playerSEA = 427; }

Next find this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 6528) // Obby Maul { return 2661; }

Above it add this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 767 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 837) // X-Bows { return 427; }

And hey presto ur done.
If you don’t have a silab server change the rune crossbow ID to whatever it is in your server.

Rep appreciated

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with Rune c bow animation!
item.dc:creator: @anthony14 anthony14
item.description:
@anthony14 wrote:

Ok I don’t get this. my client.java doesnt have get wepanim it has this

[code]
/*
* if (wearID == 6818) { // Bow-Sword playerSE = 0x811;
* playerSEA = 1665; playerSEW = 0x67F; playerSER = 0x680; }
*/
if (wearID == 4151) {
// Abyssal Whip
playerSEW = 1660;
playerSER = 1661;
playerSE = 1832;
playerSEA = 1658;
}
if ((wearID == 1249) || (wearID == 1263) || (wearID == 3176)
|| (wearID == 5716) || (wearID == 5730)) {
// Dragon Spears
playerSE = 809;
playerSEW = 1146;
playerSER = 1210;
}
if ((wearID == 1215) || (wearID == 5680) || (wearID == 1231)) {
// Dragon dagger(all of em)
playerSEA = 402;
}
if (wearID == 5698) {
// Dragon Dagger (S)
playerSEA = 402;
}
if (wearID == 4170) {
// SlayerStaff
playerSE = 2261;
playerSEA = 2324;
playerSEW = 2261;
playerSER = 2261;
}

			if (wearID == 3204) {
				// Dragon Halberd
				playerSE = 809;
				playerSEA = 440;
				playerSEW = 1146;
				playerSER = 1210;
			}

if (wearID == 6760) {
// Mjolnier
playerSE = 809;
}
if (wearID == 6762) {
// Mjolnier
playerSE = 809;
}
if (wearID == 6764) {
// Mjolnier
playerSE = 809;
}
if (wearID == 1434) {
// Dragon Mace
playerSEA = 1060;
}
if (wearID == 1305) {
// Dragon Longsword
playerSE = 809;
playerSEA = 451;
}
if (wearID == 4587) {
// Dragon Longsword
playerSEA = 451;
}
if (wearID == 6523) {
// Obby sword
playerSEA = 451;
}
if (wearID == 1419) {
// Scythe
playerSEA = 408;
}
if (wearID == -1) {
// Unarmed
playerSEA = 423;
}
if (wearID == 4153) {
// Granite Maul
playerSE = 1662;
playerSEA = 1665;
playerSEW = 1663;
playerSER = 1664;
}
if (wearID == 4675) {
// Ancient staff
playerSE = 809;
playerSEA = 806;
playerSEW = 1146;
playerSER = 1210;
}
if (wearID == 6914) {
// Master Wand
playerSE = 809;
playerSEA = 806;
playerSEW = 1146;
playerSER = 1210;
} }[/code]

It has stuff like that to make weapon animations so how would i add rune c bow?
